title: Opulent Beachfront Dubai Escape on The Palm Jumeirah
description: You'll find there's no truer reflection of Dubai's luxury and extravagance than the five-star Jumeriah Zabeel Saray Dubai, located on Palm Jumeirah's West Crescent. Expect to spend your days deciding which of the hotel’s eight lavish restaurants to dine at, which book to enjoy as you laze by the glamorous infinity pool and private beach, what time to visit the nearby Wild Wadi Waterpark™ and whether to sweat it out in the spa’s Turkish Hammam or chill out in the Snow Room.
offer_address: The Palm Jumeirah, West Crescent Road, Dubai, UAE
